contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|type =plant|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} :''This article is about the plant genus. For the performer, see [[Milla Jovovich]]; for the [[Cameroon]]ian [[Football (soccer)|footballer]], see [[Roger Milla]]; for the place in Burkina Faso, see [[Milla, Burkina Faso]]. Milla is also the name of a character in "The Seventh Tower" By Garth Nix.'' {{Automatic taxobox |taxon = Milla |authority = [[Antonio JosÃ© Cavanilles|Cav.]] |subdivision_ranks = Species |subdivision = See text. }} '''''Milla''''' is a genus of plant belonging to the family [[Asparagaceae]], subfamily [[Brodiaeoideae]],<ref>{{citation |last=Stevens |first=P.F. |year=2001 onwards |title=Angiosperm Phylogeny Website: Asparagales: Brodiaeoideae |url=http://www.mobot.org/mobot/research/apweb/orders/asparagalesweb.htm#Themidaceae }}</ref> and contains the following species of plants. * ''[[Milla biflora]]'', Mexican star ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Brodiaeoideae]] [[Category:Asparagaceae genera]] {{Asparagales-stub}}
